job_details.Functieomschrijving:
At Databricks, our core values are at the heart of everything we do; creating a culture of proactiveness and a customer-centric mindset guides us to create a unified platform that makes data science and analytics accessible to everyone. We aim to inspire our customers to make informed decisions that push their business forward. We provide a user-friendly and intuitive platform that makes it easy to turn insights into action and fosters a culture of creativity, experimentation, and continuous improvement. You will be an essential part of this mission, using your technical expertise to demonstrate how our Databricks Data Intelligence Platform can help customers solve their complex data challenges. You'll work with a collaborative, customer-focused team that values innovation and creativity, using your skills to create customized solutions to help our customers achieve their goals and guide their businesses forward. Join us in our quest to change how people work with data and make a
   better world!

   Reporting to Senior Manager, Field Engineering.

   The impact you will have:
     * Form successful relationships with clients throughout your assigned territory, working with an account executive to provide technical and business value.
     * Gain excitement from clients about Databricks through hands-on evaluation and Spark programming, integrating with the wider cloud ecosystem and 3rd party applications.
     * Contribute to building the Databricks technical through engagement at workshops, seminars, and meet-ups.
     * Become a Big Data Analytics advisor on aspects of architecture and design.
     * Support your customers by authoring reference architectures, how-tos, and demo applications.
     * Develop both technically and in the pre-sales aspect with the goal of becoming an independently operating Solutions Engineer.
job_details.full_text:
Sr. Solutions Engineer

At Databricks, our core values are at the heart of everything we do; creating a culture of proactiveness and a customer-centric mindset guides us to create a unified platform that makes data science and analytics accessible to everyone. We aim to inspire our customers to make informed decisions that push their business forward. We provide a user-friendly and intuitive platform that makes it easy to turn insights into action and fosters a culture of creativity, experimentation, and continuous improvement. You will be an essential part of this mission, using your technical expertise to demonstrate how our Databricks Data Intelligence Platform can help customers solve their complex data challenges. You'll work with a collaborative, customer-focused team that values innovation and creativity, using your skills to create customized solutions to help our customers achieve their goals and guide their businesses forward. Join us in our quest to change how people work with data and make a
   better world!

   Reporting to Senior Manager, Field Engineering.

   The impact you will have:
     * Form successful relationships with clients throughout your assigned territory, working with an account executive to provide technical and business value.
     * Gain excitement from clients about Databricks through hands-on evaluation and Spark programming, integrating with the wider cloud ecosystem and 3rd party applications.
     * Contribute to building the Databricks technical through engagement at workshops, seminars, and meet-ups.
     * Become a Big Data Analytics advisor on aspects of architecture and design.
     * Support your customers by authoring reference architectures, how-tos, and demo applications.
     * Develop both technically and in the pre-sales aspect with the goal of becoming an independently operating Solutions Engineer.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on client relationships, pre-sales technical consulting, and demonstrating a platform's value. While it mentions data and analytics, it lacks specific details on core AI/ML engineering tasks like model development, training, or deployment, making it not a direct fit for ML or GenAI Engineer profiles.

phrases: make informed decisions that push their business forward
help customers solve their complex data challenges
help customers achieve their goals and guide their businesses forward
become an independently operating Solutions Engineer
job_tasks.justification: These phrases highlight the need to understand customer business needs, translate them into technical solutions, and demonstrate business value through the platform.

phrases: integrating with the wider cloud ecosystem and 3rd party applications
authoring reference architectures, how-tos, and demo applications
job_tasks.justification: Mentions of Spark programming and integration with cloud/3rd party applications suggest software development aspects, particularly in demonstrating platform capabilities and building reference solutions.

phrases: help customers solve their complex data challenges
Develop both technically and in the pre-sales aspect
